detaileddescription.para: ctrl command: change wnic working frequency(Hz)
ctrl command: change wnic working method(interrupt or poll)
get info command: get all info of wnic
when scan is done, need to update its result

briefdescription.para: wnic on state operations such as init success, init failed hardware assert, connected, disconnected, mac updated, scan finished

detaileddescription.para: informations about wnic open state, working state, frequence, working method

briefdescription.para: get an wnic device by wnic device id.

For how to use wnic device hal refer to Functions in wnic device structure
wnic_id
id of wnic, defined by user
!NULL
pointer to an wnic device structure (dev_wnic)
NULL
failed to find the wnic device by wnic_id
need to implemented by user in user code get an wnic device by wnic device id.

briefdescription.para: wireless network interface controller device hardware layer definitions

detaileddescription.para: provide common definitions for wnic device, then software developer can develop wnic driver following this definitions, and the applications can directly call this definition to realize functions
